channel.title: Need help in making a client
channel.description: So, I know I will get hated :palm: at but I was wondering what are the steps to making a client on moparclassic? I got everything from the server side all hooked up and connected. I downloaded the alternate moparclassic client folder and tried to create a jar but was unsuccessful. I was wondering if anyone could guide in the the right direction. I don't know if this has been posted before.

item.title: Need help in making a client
